snippet: Ri Sol-ju, the wife of Kim Jong-un, was pictured with what appeared to be a Christian Dior handbag. The bag’s going price in Seoul is $1,600, about 16 times the monthly wage of some of the country’s best-paid workers.
abstract: Ri Sol-ju, the wife of North Korea's young leader , Kin Jong-un, was pictured this week with what appears to be a luxury many North Korean women have probably never heard of, much less owned, a Christian Dior handbag.
lead_paragraph: Ri Sol-ju, the wife of Kim Jong-un, was pictured with what appeared to be a Christian Dior handbag. The bag’s going price in Seoul is $1,600, about 16 times the monthly wage of some of the country’s best-paid workers.

headline.main: North Korea: Is That a Dior, Comrade?
headline.print_headline: North Korea: Is That a Dior, Comrade?
